'''2.1.2366-beta''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]), '''2.1.2365-beta''' ([[wikipedia:macOS|macOS]]), or '''2.1.2364-beta''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]) is an update to the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]] released on February 11, 2019.

== Additions ==
* The launcher will now display a notification of new launcher versions, even if they release while the launcher is already running.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed a bug that caused the launcher to soft-lock when there was no <code>launcher_profiles.json</code> file on disk.
* {{bug|MCL-5436}}: Cannot launch directory junction files.
* {{bug|MCL-10280}}: Launcher can't save the game directory in profiles.
